title: Fosse FC-2 VST Organ Controller
description:
9 drawbars mapped to “Upper B” in VB3
6 potentiometers mapped to Volume, Bass, Treble, Reverb, Key click and Drive
Vibrato On / Off switch
Percussion on/off switch
3 way Leslie switch to control Leslie / rotary speaker speed: Slow, Stop and Fast
Pedal input for controlling Rotary speaker speed & a regular sustain pedal (On / Off).
Pedal input for Swell (volume)
